data.title: Healthy chicken salad
ingredients: zest and juice ½  lime (about 1 tbsp)
½  chilli , deseeded and thinly sliced

method.steps_editor_conten: Cover the chicken with cold water, bring to the boil, then cook for 10 mins. Remove from the pan and tear into shreds. Stir together the fish sauce, lime zest, juice and sugar until sugar dissolves.
Place the leaves and coriander in a container, then top with the chicken, onion, chilli and cucumber. Place the dressing in a separate container and toss through the salad when ready to eat.
